website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for traditional beer glasses that are functional, reasonably sturdy, and attractive, this set of 4 is a great choice for enjoying all of your favorite brews.
pros: Well-made, classic beer glasses with a touch of elegance, thanks to the traditional curved design that's crafted to make the most of flavors and aromas
Generous size accommodates a pint with room to spare

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WITHIN 2 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what's going on with quality these days, but one of four glasses broke exactly 2 months after purchase. Poured cold juice into the room temperature glass and the thick bottom split. A tiny shard of glass was then found floating around in the juice.
customer_reviews.author: RancorKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Glass cracks/shatters easily.
customer_reviews.text: Two months later... two of the four glasses are broken. One developed a crack and we have no idea how it happened. The other fell two inches in the sink and completely shattered. We have a large collection of glasses of various sizes and shapes that we’ve had for years. These are definitely poor quality and break very easily. Too late for a refund. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Ardizzone

customer_reviews.title: Overly fragile
customer_reviews.text: Two of these fractured while using our ice dispenser. This has never happened with any other glass in 12 years with that dispenser. One broke on our countertop whrn dropped from about 6 inches and sort of exploded leaving numerous tiny shards of glass in a bizarrely large radius. In my opinion, these glasses are too fragile to be safe for drinking glasses. I have thrown the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 glasses. They all have scratches within the glass. In particular, there is a deep scratch approximately 2 inches from the top of the rim. Save your money and time and do not buy these glasses. Very poor quality and I am returning to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. They don’t hold 19 ozs more like 16 ozs. Still they do the job
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a 16 oz beer and that is all I really cared about.
customer_reviews.author: Cptcouch

customer_reviews.title: Quality issue
customer_reviews.text: Glass quality was low. There were many imperfections and there are many "lines" parallel to the rim in every glass. The glass also has "texture", as though uneven but it is smooth to the touch. Perhaps a bad batch. Given the low price, I did not return.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Janie C

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for the quality,glass was cloudy and felt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses for a great price! No issues in the freezer or the dishwasher. Would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Item delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were what I wanted but thy arrived broken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I did not expect the highest quality glasses, but these are embarrassingly poor
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the highest quality glasses, but these are embarrassingly poor. One of the glasses arrived cracked. All glasses had scuff marks all over the surface. Most surprisingly, the surface of these glasses is not smooth! These gassed have diagonal waves running throughout the surface. I deeply question the manufacturing process and quality control for these.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Livshits

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: The first box arrived all broken, which was probably Fed Ex’s fault. I was given a refund. The second shipment arrived in perfect condition. I use these glasses for beer, water, iced tea, milk, on the dinner table, in other words, for everything. I love the way they fit in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: JannieinVA

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first run through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: The glass on these is too thin. Which breaks my heart because I love the shape and size of them.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Not a pint shape. Not a Pilsner shape. Not a Weisen shape. A blend of all three. Sort of like the Guinness gravity shape.

customer_reviews.title: Big, strong, and nice price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses for making smoothies. They hold a lot, they're tough, and well-priced. What's not to like?
